text: Woodrow Stanley (June 12, 1950 â€“ February 15, 2022) was an American Democratic Party politician. He was mayor of Flint, Michigan from 1991 until his recall in 2002. He was a member of the Michigan House of Representatives from District 34 from 2009 to 2014. Stanley was born in Schlater, Mississippi.Votesmart.org.-Woodrow Stanley Stanley died at a hospital in Flint on February 15, 2022, at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Mississippi Category:Politicians from Flint, Michigan Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Woodrow Stanley
